languages.text: {n}Муаран собирается что-то сказать, но тут его перебивает повстанец.{/n} "Если эт{mf|от|а}... пришл{mf|ый|ая} и дальше будет нам диктовать условия, я сдерживаться не буду, комагдир! Вы видели, на что он{mf||а} способ{mf|ен|на}, что он{mf||а} с Янусом {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}сотворил{mf||а}{/d}?! Лучше сдохнуть, чем в такой полон!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Муаран собирается что-то сказать, но тут его перебивает Богул.{/n} "Нет! И думать забудь! Лучше ксеносы, чем наместники этого исчадия. Вы видели, на что он{mf||а} способ{mf|ен|на}?! Лучше сдохнуть, чем в такой полон!"

languages.text: {n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}done{/d} to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"
languages.original_text: {n}Муаран собирается что-то сказать, но тут его перебивает повстанец.{/n} "Если эт{mf|от|а}... пришл{mf|ый|ая} и дальше будет нам диктовать условия, я сдерживаться не буду, комагдир! Вы видели, на что он{mf||а} способ{mf|ен|на}, что он{mf||а} с Янусом {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}сотворил{mf||а}{/d}?! Лучше сдохнуть, чем в такой полон!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s done to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

{n}Ulrahn tries to say something, before Bogul interrupts him.{/n} "No! Forget about it! We'd rather have xenos than someone appointed by this fiend. Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

{n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s done to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

{n}Ulrahn tries to say something, before Bogul interrupts him.{/n} "No! Forget about it! We'd rather have xenos than someone appointed by this fiend. Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

{n}Muaran tries to say something, before Bogul interrupts him.{/n} "No! Forget about it! We'd rather have xenos than someone appointed by this fiend. Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

{n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s done to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

{n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s done to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

languages.text: {n}穆兰想要说些什么，但叛军士兵打断了他的话。{/n}“如果这个……外来者一直这么指手画脚的话，我恐怕忍不住要动手了，指挥官！你看到{mf|他|她}的能力了吗？你看到{mf|他|她}对加努斯{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}做了{/d}什么吗？我宁愿去死，也不想活在这样的奴役之中！”
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}done{/d} to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

traits.locale_text: {n}穆兰想要说些什么，但叛军士兵打断了他的话。{/n}“如果这个……外来者一直这么指手画脚的话，我恐怕忍不住要动手了，指挥官！你看到{mf|他|她}的能力了吗？你看到{mf|他|她}对加努斯做了什么吗？我宁愿去死，也不想活在这样的奴役之中！”

languages.text: {n}ムアランは何かを言おうとしたが、反乱者がそれを遮る。{/n}「こんな…この星にいない奴に命令される状況が続くなんて我慢ならないぞ、司令！あいつに何ができる？あいつはヤヌスに{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}何を{/d}してくれる？そんな奴隷になって生きるくらいなら死ぬ方がマシだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}done{/d} to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ムアランは何かを言おうとしたが、反乱者がそれを遮る。{/n}「こんな…この星にいない奴に命令される状況が続くなんて我慢ならないぞ、司令！あいつに何ができる？あいつはヤヌスに{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}何を{/d}してくれる？そんな奴隷になって生きるくらいなら死ぬ方がマシだ！」

languages.text: {n}Muaran will etwas sagen, aber der Rebell unterbricht ihn:{/n} "Falls {mf|dieser ... Außenweltler|diese ... Außenweltlerin} weiterhin Bedingungen stellt, kann ich mich nicht mehr beherrschen, Commander! Habt Ihr gesehen, wozu {mf|er|sie} fähig ist, was {mf|er|sie} Janus {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}angetan{/d} hat? Lieber sterbe ich, als in derartiger Sklaverei zu leben!"
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}done{/d} to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran will etwas sagen, aber der Rebell unterbricht ihn:{/n} "Falls {mf|dieser ... Außenweltler|diese ... Außenweltlerin} weiterhin Bedingungen stellt, kann ich mich nicht mehr beherrschen, Commander! Habt Ihr gesehen, wozu {mf|er|sie} fähig ist, was {mf|er|sie} Janus angetan hat? Lieber sterbe ich, als in derartiger Sklaverei zu leben!"

languages.text: {n}Muaran ouvre la bouche pour répliquer, mais le rebelle l'interrompt.{/n} « Si {mf|cet... étranger|cette... étrangère} continue à vouloir nous imposer ses conditions, je ne réponds plus de rien, commandant ! Vous avez vu de quoi {mf|il|elle} est capable ? Ce qu'{mf|il|elle} a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}fait{/d} à Janus ? Plutôt mourir que de vivre dans ce genre de servitude ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}done{/d} to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran ouvre la bouche pour répliquer, mais le rebelle l'interrompt.{/n} « Si {mf|cet... étranger|cette... étrangère} continue à vouloir nous imposer ses conditions, je ne réponds plus de rien, commandant ! Vous avez vu de quoi {mf|il|elle} est capable ? Ce qu'{mf|il|elle} a fait à Janus ? Plutôt mourir que de vivre dans ce genre de servitude ! »

languages.text: {n}Muaran trata de decir algo, pero el rebelde le interrumpe:{/n} «Como est{mf|e|a}... foraster{mf|o|a} sigue dictando los términos, ¡no podré contenerme, comandante! ¿Has visto de lo que es capaz? ¿Lo que le ha {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}hecho{/d} a Janus? ¡Prefiero morir a vivir como un esclavo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}done{/d} to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran trata de decir algo, pero el rebelde le interrumpe:{/n} «Como est{mf|e|a}... foraster{mf|o|a} sigue dictando los términos, ¡no podré contenerme, comandante! ¿Has visto de lo que es capaz? ¿Lo que le ha hecho a Janus? ¡Prefiero morir a vivir como un esclavo!».

languages.text: {n}Muaran bir şeyler demeye başlar başlamaz isyancı, onun lafını kesiyor.{/n} "Eğer ki bu... Dışdünyalı şart dikte etmeye devam ederse kendimi tutamayacağım Komutan! Bu {mf|adamın|kadının} elinden neler geldiğini, Janus'a neler {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}yaşattığını{/d} gördünüz mü? Öyle bir kölelik altında yaşamaktansa ölmeyi yeğlerim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran tries to say something, but the rebel interrupts him:{/n} "If this... offworlder keeps dictating terms, I won't be able to stop myself, Commander! Have you seen what {mf|he|she}'s capable of, what {mf|he|she}'s {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusTyrannical}done{/d} to Janus? I'd rather die than live in that kind of slavery!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran bir şeyler demeye başlar başlamaz isyancı, onun lafını kesiyor.{/n} "Eğer ki bu... Dışdünyalı şart dikte etmeye devam ederse kendimi tutamayacağım Komutan! Bu {mf|adamın|kadının} elinden neler geldiğini, Janus'a neler yaşattığını gördünüz mü? Öyle bir kölelik altında yaşamaktansa ölmeyi yeğlerim!"
